action.name: Set text
action.param: "I don't want to throw taht into the pond..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Mayn Tschar:" & newline & "I can't do that from here..." & newline & "He would see me..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Mayn Tschar:" & newline & "There you go. I have a hot dog for you."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Vuvuzela Girl:" & newline & "That is so generous. Now I can tell my mom I earned food with my talent!!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Giving him the fish like that wouldn't be the same like catching the fish..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Mayn Tschar:" & newline & "Maybe you can use this soy sauce as ink?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hot Dog Guy:" & newline & "This is a marvelous idea! Could have been mine!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hot Dog Guy:" & newline & "Please sign here to get a free hot dog."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hot Dog Guy:" & newline & "Thank you very much. And here is your hot dog!"
